summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Chicago Street from Rainier Avenue to 46th Avenue South, by constructing concrete walks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 96485 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
